Nightmare Containment can be found in the Castellum at any time while exploring the destination. However, Guardians are advised to choose the Containment option when going to the event to join others with similar intent.

displayProperties.description:
Equip your Void or Stasis subclass and weapons to generate corresponding orbs. Collect them to become empowered by the element of the final orb collected.

Void empowerment grants invisibility while crouching, Truesight, and enhanced ability energy regeneration.

Stasis empowerment reduces Super energy drain and defeated combatants spawn exploding Stasis crystals.

displayProperties.description:
While you were speaking to Tyra, she mentioned something called the Hated Path, a sort of primer to transform an ordinary Hand Cannon into a Thorn. Bathe your Light in horrors. Feed your weapon with death. Bind it with sickness. Horrors, death, sickness… that all sounds like the Hive nests on Titan to you.

Defeat the Arbiters, Sardav and Telesh, then defeat Savathûn's Song in an epic reprise of strike "Savathûn's Song" on Titan.

selectionScreenDisplayProperties.description:
Choose this activity mode to join others who intend to participate in the event, Nightmare Containment.

This mode is primarily for those planning to join the event on arrival at the landing zone.

The Derelict Leviathan can be explored at any time after launching from this mode. However, Guardians are advised to choose the Castellum option when heading to the destination with the intent to explore.

During this activity, your Power Level will be raised to {var:1297460626}

selectionScreenDisplayProperties.description:
The Vanguard authorizes Nightfall strikes to take down the greatest threats faced by the City. These critical operations challenge even veteran Guardians to quickly and completely neutralize those threats—and the Vanguard rates the fireteam's performance accordingly.

Use every ability at your disposal to defeat your enemies in as little time as possible, and try for a new team score record.
